title: Back to Top
description: The Illinois component back-to-top allows you to provide a simple way to skip either to the top of a page or to a designated point in the page (such as the page content area). You can choose alternate Illinois brand colors and adjust the position of the arrow.

attributes.name: target
attributes.description: The ID of the element which represents the top of the page. If provided, the page will scroll to this element.

attributes.name: alt
attributes.description: The accessible text label of the button, defaults to 'Back to top'

styles.name: --ilw-back-to-top-foreground-color
styles.description: Color of the back to top

styles.name: --ilw-back-to-top-background-color
styles.description: Background color of the back to top
